Wolfblade::

She backed off from the scene and leaned against the wall. "Huh, 
battefield is no place for fledgling bots. Kids are bad luck in war."

She shook her head and tried not to look at the kid. Her optics 
focused hard to the opposite wall. Her face showed concentration.
